trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Vert for en samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewButtonColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that respond to simple user input.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataGridViewButtonColumn er en spesiell den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>klassen som brukes som vert for logisk celler som svar på enkle brukerinndata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewButtonColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: En DataGridViewButtonColumn har en tilknyttet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>i hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>som går gjennom det.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: Hver celle leverer brukergrensesnittet (UI) som ligner på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: To display the same button text for every cell, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> property to the desired button text.
trans-unit.target: For å vise den samme for teksten for hver celle, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>egenskapen `true` og angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>til ønsket for teksten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: Sorter standardmodus for denne kolonnetypen er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: To respond to user button clicks, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: For å svare på brukeren knappen klikker, kan du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the event handler, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether the click occurred in the button column.
trans-unit.target: I behandlingsprogram, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å fastslå om Klikk oppstod i kolonnen vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether the click occurred in a button cell and not on the column header.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å fastslå om Klikk oppstod i en celle for knappen og ikke kolonneoverskriften.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>, and cell styles specified through properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> have no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når visuelle stiler er aktivert, knappene i en Knappekolonne er malt ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>, og celle stiler angitt gjennom egenskaper som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"> </xref> klassen til standardstatusen.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer kolonnen ved å angi følgende egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>.| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>| En ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>. | | Egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>-objektet som ble returnert av egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir malen som brukes til å opprette nye celler.

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>klassen initialiserer denne egenskapen til en nyopprettede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Endre egenskaper for celle malen umiddelbart påvirker ikke brukergrensesnittet (UI) med kolonnens eksisterende celler.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: Endringene er bare synlige når kolonnen genereres (for eksempel ved å sortere kolonnen eller via et kall til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som alle celler i kolonnen er modellert etter.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property could not be cast to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen ikke kan endres til en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en nøyaktig kopi av denne kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of button cells.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden for å kopiere en kolonne med knappen celler.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer det klonede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kolonnens standardstilen cellen.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has an initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>returneres av denne egenskapen har en opprinnelig <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This value overrides the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien overstyrer verdien angitt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll, men kan overstyres av en annen celle stilegenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer> and cell styles specified through properties such as DefaultCellStyle have no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når visuelle stiler er aktivert, knappene i en Knappekolonne er malt ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>og cellestiler angitt gjennom egenskaper for eksempel DefaultCellStyle har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som skal brukes som standard.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat-style appearance of the button cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir utseendet flat-stil for cellene i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The FlatStyle property specifies the appearance of the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen FlatStyle angir utseendet av cellene i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir denne egenskapen henter eller angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdateringer kolonnen vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the appearance of the buttons in the column.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> verdi som angir utseendet på knappene i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default text displayed on the button cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standardteksten som vises på knappen cellen.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> contained in the column that has as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property value of `true` displays the Text property value on the cell's button.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>i kolonnen har som en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>egenskapsverdi for `true` viser egenskapen tekstverdi i celle-knappen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: If there is an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, changing this property refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en tilknyttet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll, endrer denne egenskapen oppdaterer kolonnevisningen av.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder teksten.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Standard er <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir denne egenskapen, verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Henter en streng som beskriver kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som beskriver kolonnen.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*> property value is displayed as the button text for cells in this column.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*>egenskapsverdien vises som for tekst for celler i denne kolonnen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of a button cell is displayed as the text on the button.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>på knappen celle vises som teksten på knappen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The UseColumnTextForButtonValue property allows you to either set the button text for each cell, or to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> property value for all of the button cells.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen UseColumnTextForButtonValue gir deg muligheten til å angi enten Knappetekst for hver celle, eller bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>egenskapsverdien for alle knappen cellene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir denne egenskapen henter eller angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdateringer kolonnen vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*> property value is displayed on buttons in the column; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue*> property value of each cell is displayed on its button.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <> </> *> egenskapsverdien vises på knappene i kolonnen. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> hvis den <> </> *> egenskapsverdi for hver celle vises på knappen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>
